评论详情: Great coverage and has plenty of room. True to size. Soft and warm material. Great price.

I disregarded a lot of the bad reviews about the stitching here. I definitely shouldn't have. The seams rip so easily, especially under the arms and on the collarbone. I washed it when I got it and noticed holes days later in the areas mentioned. We stitched them back up and they haven't ripped again, thankfully. Hoping no rips show back up (I haven't washed it again), apparently all we needed to do was sew it back ourselves.  Another thing you should know is it's very thick, but if you like it that way, maybe this is for you. But it was way thicker than I expected.  Otherwise very comfy robe, I have definitely grown very fond of it since the holes are fixed. XD
I bought this for my granddaughter for her birthday and she absolutely loves it. She is 15 years old and she said it is the most comfortable soft robe she has ever had! We highly recommend it.
Soooo soft and fluffy!

This robe has been one of the best purchases I've ever made. I was skeptical at first because of it being so lightweight, and I am both simultaneously shocked and pleaded by how warm it actually is! It's fluffy, a beautiful color, and just as soft and comfortable as you can imagine. Perfect for lazy, lounging around inside on cold wintery days and nights. It's also has a great price point and doesn't look huge or add bulk on those of us who are on the plus side of things. Love love love this robe and definitely recommend!

This robe is trash sadly. I was really excited to wear it and it was somewhat soft out of the bag. I washed it before wearing fully and followed the laundering instructions to a T. I know that all super soft materials eventually lose their softness over time and after repeated washing and use. However, after zero use and a single wash, the material of this felt like literal sandpaper, not even an exaggeration. It was physically painful to even put on, hence my return. Not only that, the seams were falling apart and pilling began from a single delicates cycle. I didn’t even put in the dryer either and it still was barely hanging on. If it can’t survive that, then it clearly is not suitable to be selling for people to wear. Disappointing purchase.

评论概述: My Sister-in-Law loves this robe "It awesome".
评论详情: I sent this robe to my sister- In- Law of 40 years as a late Christmas gift. She currently has the flu and needed something warm and comforting. Amazon representatives delivered the robe right on time and handed it to her personally. After inquisition, my sister replied, "it awesome, thank you". As she coughed and sniffled.  Be well sis and be well everyone. Sometimes the smallest kind gesture can make a huge impact.

Really nice quality, just what the wife was wanting for Christmas. Both of us were really surprised it looks and feels just like the "hotel style" robes seen in so many movies. Yeah, this is a 5.  How I rate items 5 Stars = Exceeded my expectations. Love it and will buy again. 4 Stars = Exactly what I was looking and hoped for. Some issues. 3 Stars = Satisfactory. Minor, acceptable issues but it does the job. 2 Stars = Wouldn't recommend or buy again. May work for you but did not for me. 1 Stars = Complete waste of a product. Going to GoodWill.

This robe is exactly what I was wanting. Something very plush, soft, and loose fitting. I got the green and it’s a beautiful, rich, dark green. I originally purchased another robe on Amazon and returned it because it was awkward.. the sleeves were too tight, especially along the upper arms and shoulders. It felt like it was just choking your arms. I don’t understand why clothing companies think females should have the slenderest shoulders and arms. Then the robe itself was so long it almost drug on the ground. HOWEVER,  This one is the opposite of that.. it has very loose sleeves and it feels comfortable. I highly recommend. I’m so excited about this robe for winter.
